parameters.name: ShowIt
parameters.description: True if you want to show the existing exploded state for the current assembly configuration, false if you want to show the assembly in the collapsed state

title: IAssemblyDoc.ShowExploded

parameters.name: ShowIt
parameters.description: True if you want to show the existing exploded state for the current assembly configuration, false if you want to show the assembly in the collapsed state

returns: True if successful in displaying the existing exploded assembly state, false if not
